posts.postText:
Ok, most of you know the story about MLP, cupcakes...


The soul wrenching Fan-fic that scares the living crap out of you...

(Incase you are wondering what I'm talking about https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qTTzMqlRTHeHIarZZhwQhADc-1aff9fkHKWx-kn0wMk/edit?hl=en )   HUGE WARNING NSFW  

I'm thinking on making a g-mod video about someone taking action against Pinkie Pie, getting her "Just Deserts" if you will..
Now, I've already started but I do need some help, if anyone in the clan can help now is the time to act, I can host the server so there is no need for that.

Also I am offering 50 TTT points for each person who helps.

As disturbing as the story was, the writer actually did a great job with the dialogue, as far as making the characters say things similar to how they would on the actual show. Pinkie was like her normal self in the story, just with the motive of a maniacal serial killer. Anyways I've never done anything like that but I'll try to help however I can.
I've never read it but know enough not to read it...
